title: What is force true in Sequelize?
content: To your question: force: true adds a DROP TABLE IF EXISTS before trying to create the table - if you force, existing tables will be overwritten.11-Jan-2014

title: How do I sync a database with Sequelize?
content: A model can be synchronized with the database by calling model.sync(options) , an asynchronous function (that returns a Promise). With this call, Sequelize will automatically perform an SQL query to the database. Note that this changes only the table in the database, not the model in the JavaScript side

title: How do you use Boolean in Sequelize?
content: Sequelize has a BOOLEAN data type that you can use to define model attributes that accept Boolean values. The following example shows a User model that has an isActive attribute with BOOLEAN type: const User = sequelize. define
